ygData.msgSnippet: I did not see Illusion: Werewolf in Erudin, but I did see Illusion: Spirit Wolf. ... From:	Eain Bankins [mailto:eain@home.com] Sent:	Friday, May 07, 1999 6:33
ygData.messageBody:
I did not see Illusion: Werewolf in Erudin, but I did see Illusion:
Spirit Wolf.

-----Original Message-----
From: Eain Bankins [mailto:eain@...]
Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 6:33 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Hullo

From: Eain Bankins <eain@...>

Weeze wrote:

> I was also wondering what enchanter spell only are
sold in Erudin.

Some of the higher level Illusion spells. Like
Skeleton, most of the
elemental forms, I think. WEREWOLF. :)

E
